      • renderFilters

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage renderFilters(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray data,
                                         java.lang.String filename,
                                         int patchWidth,
                                         int patchHeight,
                                         int patchesPerRow)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Once the probability image and weight histograms are behaving satisfactorily, we plot the learned filter for each hidden neuron, one per column of W. Each filter is of the same dimension as the input data, and it is most useful to visualize the filters in the same way as the input data is visualized.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
